custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM OAuthApplicationUser

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM OAuthApplicationUser, OAuthApplication WHERE (OAuthApplication.ownerId = ?) AND (OAuthApplication.applicationId = OAuthApplicationUser.applicationId) AND (OAuthApplicationUser.authorized = ?)

SELECT {OAuthApplicationUser.*} FROM OAuthApplicationUser, OAuthApplication WHERE (OAuthApplication.ownerId = ?) AND (OAuthApplication.applicationId = OAuthApplicationUser.applicationId) AND (OAuthApplicationUser.authorized = ?)
